name: A Yogscast Christmas Party
description:
Simon is relaxing at home in his dressing gown, when he receives a call form Lew-Lew "He needs you to head into the office!". Upon hearing this you jump up, choose an outfit and head down to the office.  

Controls:
A - Move Left
D - Move Right
Left Click - To interact with HUD elements

This was made in the Unreal engine and is complete (ps. it has been known to crash on occasion, and its a bit rage inducing, Please Enjoy!)
